detail_desc: Trainers in imitation leather with appliqués, a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short cold shoulder dress in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, long, wide sleeves with scalloped trims, and a scalloped hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front, toe caps and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Shorts in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Elasticated waist with a twisted, tasselled drawstring, side pockets and scalloped hems. Cotton poplin lining.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Wide tunic in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves, narrow, frill-trimmed buttoned cuffs, and tiers to the hem. Partly lined.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck, decorative buttons at the front, short sleeves and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Slightly longer style with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Elasticated scrunchies in mulberry silk that are extra-gentle on the hair, as silk minimises friction and damage to the hair.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims, a stand-up collar and concealed zip with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Dress in sequined mesh with short, frilled sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut blouse in airy chiffon made from recycled polyester with a contrasting colour collar with ties and a deep V-neck with covered buttons. Large, pleated flounces with overlocked edges over the shoulders and at the cuffs and hem. Wide balloon sleeves with asymmetric cuffs.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the back, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif and appliqué on the front.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping satin with lace details. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative covered buttons at the front and a drawstring at the waist. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Top in softly draping viscose jersey with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a decorative seam at the back and a rounded hem.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Classic jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Flared, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with wide smocking at the top and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Waist bag in nylon with a zip at the top and a small, zipped outer compartment. Adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Size 8x14x26 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
V-neck poncho in an airy weave containing glittery threads with a tie belt at the waist with tassels on the ends, and a fringed hem. Width 100 cm, length of back 82 cm.
Silk tie. Width 7 cm.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high paper bag waist.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Sandals with an imitation leather toe strap, narrow, adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Hairband in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Long shirt dress in a crêpe weave with a collar, yoke and press-studs at the front and a flap chest pocket. Tie belt at the waist, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Bra top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a racer back and elasticated hem.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft, double-weave organic cotton with buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Chino shorts in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Fabric scrunchies with a shimmering pattern and decorative bow.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with decorative, crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide, cold shoulder top in slub jersey with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves.
Oversized, straight-cut, knee-length dress in stretch cotton twill with adjustable straps and an open chest pocket.
Satin dance shoes with elastication around the openings and crossover elastic straps at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and suede soles.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small, frilled collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined in satin.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a zipped slit in each side. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal detail at one end and a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Wide shorts in taffeta made from recycled polyester with gathers at the top and a wide waistband with pleats. Discreet pockets in the side seams and sequined appliqué decorations in the shape of flowers. Regular waist, a concealed zip and a wide, sewn on tie belt at one side. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Double-breasted, knee-length coat in a patterned weave containing some wool. Wide notch lapels, long raglan sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and elastication and a flounce at the top and sleeve-ends.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and contrasting colour trims.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in a soft weave with covered elastication at the waist.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Soft handbag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at both ends. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 13x25x29 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fitted, smocked blouse in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed boat neck, long, voluminous puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs, and a frill trim at the hem.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Sleeveless tops in soft jersey with a gathered seam and wide flounce at the hem. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Imitation leather keyring with a round metal ring.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, covered heels, narrow foot straps, a toe post and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless top in airy, pleated chiffon with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Trainers in imitation leather and imitation suede with mesh sections. Padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings made from recycled polyester and imitation leather insoles. Chunky soles.
